backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user onboarding, profiles, connections, messaging, and call request state with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining light/dark OKLCH color system and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and linking the LensGram icon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and authentication/onboarding gating logic for all app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing screen shown to unauthenticated users with branding and login prompt.
frontend/src/components/calls/CallReques: UI panel for initiating, accepting, declining, and ending call requests between users.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main page layout with header, navigation, footer, and dynamic child content.
frontend/src/components/layout/PrimaryNa: Renders top navigation buttons and highlights the active route using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/users/UserResult: Displays a user's profile card with connection status and actions such as sending or viewing requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallRequests.ts: Provides hooks to query call state and perform call actions like initiate, accept, decline, and end.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Handles fetching messages for a chat and sending new messages with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnectionRequests: Manages connection requests, including fetching pending requests, profiles, sending, accepting, rejecting, and checking status.
frontend/src/hooks/useConnections.ts: Fetches user connections and their profiles, plus retrieving a single user's profile by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves the currently authenticated user's profile and provides an onboarding mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes a simple readiness check for when the backend actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSearch.ts: Queries the backend for a user profile by username, returning null for empty searches.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ChatDetailPage.tsx: Chat view showing messages with a user, sending new messages, and handling navigation and calls.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Lists user connections and lets users open individual chat threads.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Provides username search and displays user search results.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: User onboarding form for display name, email, and username creation.
frontend/src/pages/RequestsPage.tsx: Displays pending connection requests with accept and decline actions.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utilities for formatting timestamps and message times into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
